str2: Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
(Hebrew), Isaac, the patriarch. Of Hebrew origin; Isaac, the son of Abraham.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (lit: I speak well of) I bless; pass: I am blessed. From a compound of eu and logos; to speak well of, i.e. to bless.
Of Hebrew origin; Jacob, the progenitor of the Israelites.
Esau, elder son of Isaac the patriarch, brother of Jacob. Of Hebrew origin; Esau, an Edomite.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Neuter Plural
str2: A strengthened form of melo; to intend, i.e. Be about to be, do, or suffer something.
